entries.title: Samsung will announce the Galaxy S23 on Feb. 1 at Unpacked. Here’s what to expect
entries.description: Samsung’s first in-person event in years is set for Feb. 1 in San Francisco. Here’s everything you need to know.

entries.title: Get the 65-inch LG C2 OLED smart TV for less than $1,500
entries.description: At 42% off, you can bring OLED picture into your home for an amazing price.

entries.title: The 5 best outdoor speakers of 2023
entries.description: Not all speakers are prepared for the challenges of the outdoors. These best outdoor speakers can help you make the warmer weather even more enjoyable this year.

entries.title: Apple is reportedly planning to phase out Broadcom and Qualcomm chips
entries.description: Tech giant Apple wants to create one, in-house chip that will deliver cellular, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth capabilities, according to a new report.

entries.title: This new heath tracker has an 'endless battery' powered by your body
entries.description: Baracoda's BHeart health tracker, unveiled at CES, can operate in most standard watches, eliminating the need to choose between your smartwatch and a formal timepiece.

entries.title: What is Google Assistant Continued Conversation and how do you enable the feature?
entries.description: Ever wanted to have a conversation with Google Assistant to find out more about a subject? For that, you'll need to enable Continued Conversation. Find out what that is and how to enable the feature.

entries.title: The 12 best Windows laptops of 2023
entries.description: If you're looking for a Windows laptop, there are countless options to choose from. Dell, HP, Lenovo, Acer, Asus, LG, and Microsoft are among the top players, so we reviewed and compared their Windows laptops to find the best.

entries.title: The 5 best wireless speakers of 2023
entries.description: From Sonos to Anker, we found the best wireless speakers so you can enjoy your own soundtrack no matter where you go.

entries.title: An extension to the Android SDK brings updated features for older devices
entries.description: Google's extension of the Android SDK will make new feature and security updates available for a broader population of Android users.

entries.title: Raspberry Pi's Camera Module 3 arrives with these big updates
entries.description: The 12 megapixel Camera Module 3 is available in multiple variants, starting at $25.

entries.title: The 5 best speakers of 2023
entries.description: Whether you are a casual listener or a professional audiophile, the best speakers provide excellent sound, bass, and clarity for your listening pleasure.

entries.title: Your Instagram app is going to look very different next month
entries.description: Instagram is introducing new changes that will change the look of your app's home screen.

entries.title: The 5 best rechargeable batteries of 2023
entries.description: By switching from disposable batteries to rechargeable batteries, you can save money and the planet.

entries.title: How to easily locate your mouse pointer in Ubuntu and other GNOME-based Linux distributions
entries.description: If you have trouble locating your mouse pointer in Linux, this little tip will give you some much-needed relief.

entries.title: How to install Kali Linux on Apple Silicon Macs
entries.description: It's not as smooth as it could be, but it can be done.

entries.title: Mabox Linux is a throwback to old-school Linux with a new-school look and feel
entries.description: If you're looking for an Arch-based Linux distribution that is easy to install and offers a different UI than the tried and true GNOME, KDE, or Xfce, Mabox Linux might be just what you want.

entries.title: Doogee V30: 5G, eSIM, and Android 12 comes to rugged phones
entries.description: The Doogee V30 is a rugged phone that's worthy of the "flagship" title.

entries.title: Say goodbye to Windows 7 as Microsoft ends extended support
entries.description: Time has run out for any of you still keeping Windows 7 PCs secure with Microsoft's Extended Security Updates.

entries.title: The ChatGPT revolution? Microsoft seems to have very big plans for this AI chatbot
entries.description: Microsoft could be ready to spend billions on ChatGPT and extend use of the chatbot through its products according to reports.

entries.title: Here's why I have an earwax removal camera in my toolkit (and no, it's not for my ears)
entries.description: It's great for peering into all kinds of things!

entries.title: Chromebook deal: Save $80 on the Lenovo IdeaPad Duet 3
entries.description: The IdeaPad Duet 3 hybrid Chromebook is now on sale for under $300.

entries.title: Is Apple sweating yet? These 4 companies just turned up the heat at CES
entries.description: Satellite messaging, MagSafe-like charging, 5K studio monitors, and more are on the year's docket, but not from Apple.

entries.title: NASA's budget was $24B in 2022. Here's how it spends the money
entries.description: Is space exploration worth the money? We've had a look at the numbers so you can decide.

entries.title: Virgin Orbit: Pioneering satellite launch ends in failure after rocket 'anomaly'
entries.description: 'Yes, space is hard, but we are only just getting started,' says Spaceport Cornwall chief.

entries.title: B&H cuts price of Acer Predator Triton 300 gaming notebook by $270
entries.description: The high-spec notebook is a great option for gaming and work purposes.
